channel.title: Linux VPS, How can i run a server?
channel.description:
Hello guys
i got a linux vps, 1tb bandwith, 100gb storage room 1ghz workmemory, i want to own a private server but how can i install it? i got ubuntu as OS.
can someone help me I did not download any client, could someone give me a GOOD understandable tutorial??

item.title: Linux VPS, How can i run a server?

item.description:

hmm i doesnt say anything about installing a soure

i want to run this source: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,391563.0.html

how can i do that?

Read full topic
